plot: Rainer Schottlaender was a political prisoner in East Germany after he failed to escape from the country in 1971. Until today, he defines himself in an opposite position to 'the system'. But who will hear you when freedom reigns?
title: Klopfzeichen
plot_es: Rainer Schottlaender was a political prisoner in East Germany after he failed to escape from the country in 1971. Until today, he defines himself in an opposite position to 'the system'. But who will hear you when freedom reigns?
plot_en: Rainer Schottlaender was a political prisoner in East Germany after he failed to escape from the country in 1971. Until today, he defines himself in an opposite position to 'the system'. But who will hear you when freedom reigns?
